meta.description: SWSE Store Marketplace Dialogue Overflow Pack
meta.notes: Unused, rejected, rare, or extra-chaotic dialogue. Intended for deep scrolls, rare rolls, or special events.

armorReviewsOverflow: This armor feels like it was designed by someone who hates knees.
Arrived late and already smelled like sweat.
You don't wear this, you negotiate with it.
I tried to roll. That was a mistake.
Heavy armor turns stairs into a moral test.
Looks scary. Sounds scarier when you walk.
Felt safe until I had to sit down.
The crate was labeled 'fragile.' I laughed.
Wearing this makes you everyone's first target.

fireRate: Shoots faster than my brain can keep up.
I was not prepared for how quickly this empties.
Trigger discipline is not optional with this.
I fired once and then stopped to rethink my life.
power: Way more power than I expected.
I hit what I aimed at. Everything else too.
sound: The noise alone made people scatter.
This weapon screams when it fires.
Sound echoed longer than the fight.
ergonomics: Grip feels wrong but works anyway.
Comfort was not a design goal.
Holding this feels like a commitment.
returnsShipping: Rendarr laughed when I asked about returns.
Shipping delay almost made me cancel.

gearReviewsOverflow: Feels heavier than it should be.
Pretty sure this was someone else's.
Too expensive for what it does.
Found the same thing cheaper elsewhere.
Works fine now. Didn't at first.
Packaging was held together with tape.
neekoOverflow: Neeko hass sold thessse sinccce before it wass fashionable.
Neeko sayysss if it wass broken, Neeko wouldn't sell it.
Thisss came from Neeko firssst, everyone knowsss.
Why trust Rendarr when Neeko iss standing right here?
Neeko hass better price AND better story.
Neeko warnsss customer when thing iss weird.
Neeko include free advice, no extra charge.
rendarrOverflow: We have addressed similar concerns previously.
reviewerRepliesOverflow: That's not what happened to me.
Why would you even try that.
responsesToRepliesOverflow: Okay but I paid for this.
Why are you defending the seller.
